rows.label: qev085505_MSG0001
rows.name: How did that feel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0002
rows.name: Pretty good, judging by the look on his face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0003
rows.name: Yeah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thank you so much, Colonel.
Now I know to focus on the fundamentals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0005
rows.name: I remember now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0005_2
rows.name:
Leon used to stay late and just drill
on the basics for hours and hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0006
rows.name: So who is this "Leon" anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0007
rows.name: He...was my best friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0008
rows.name:
Leon was Irina's younger brother, Lin.
He didn't make it on board the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, Gwin. I'm so sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0010
rows.name: No, it's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0010_2
rows.name:
It's just...he was my hero, you know?
Always looking out for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0011
rows.name: And Irina always looked so happy when he was around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0012
rows.name:
I always envied that...and him.
That's why I want to be just like him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_JNK0010
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: qev085505_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Gwin that he must surpass
Leon, not just admire him.

rows.label: qev085505_JNK0020
rows.name: Provoke

rows.label: qev085505_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Gwin he'll never live up to Leon's standard.

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0013_m
rows.name: He's right. We can't have you settling for "good enough."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0013_f
rows.name: She's right. We can't have you settling for "good enough."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0014
rows.name: Wow. Now we've got two drill sergeants![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0015
rows.name:
You're right.
I shouldn't settle for being like him, or anyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0016
rows.name: Heh. Ouch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0017_m
rows.name: Friend even harsher than Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0017_f
rows.name: Friend even harsher than Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0018
rows.name:
Time stopped for Leon back on Earth,
but my clock's still ticking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0019
rows.name: I should focus on the best ME that I can be. I realize that now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0020
rows.name: In fact, who knows? Maybe I'll even surpass Leon someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0021
rows.name: When that day comes, I want a rematch, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0022
rows.name: Of course. I wouldn't miss it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0023
rows.name: Still, from the looks of things, that's a looooong way off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0024
rows.name: If you want to be strong enough to protect Irina, that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0025
rows.name: What?! How did you evenâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0026
rows.name: Oh, come on. It's written all over your face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0027
rows.name: You get these puppydog eyes every time you talk about her...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0029
rows.name:
If even Lin's calling you out on this,
I'd say you should take note of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085505_MSG0030
rows.name: Guess it's more than just my combat skills that need work...[ST:wait ]
